description: This file defines FastAPI route handlers for managing 'Data' items, including listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting data items stored in a database. It includes filtering, sorting, and projection functionalities for data retrieval.

methods.name: _apply_filter
methods.description: Applies filtering conditions to a SQLAlchemy select statement based on provided filter object, supporting nested JSON fields and UUID filtering.

methods.name: _apply_sort
methods.description: Applies sorting to a SQLAlchemy select statement based on specified sort field and direction.

methods.name: _project_item
methods.description: Projects a database Item object into a dictionary, optionally filtering specific fields based on input.

methods.name: list_data
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list data items with optional filtering, sorting, and field projection, returning paginated results.

methods.name: get_data_item
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a single data item by UUID.

methods.name: create_data_item
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new data item with provided payload.

methods.name: update_data_item
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to replace the data content of an existing data item identified by UUID.

methods.name: delete_data_item
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a data item by UUID.
